attributes.action: Legalise anabolic steroids and performance enhancement drugs.
attributes.additional_details:
Deaths caused by Britain's most commonly used drugs.

Tobacco: 114,000+
Alcohol: 40,000+
Heroin: 897
Cocaine: 235 
Speed: 35
Ecstasy: 27
Cannabis: 19
Anabolic Steroids: 0

[Prof David Nutt, BBC Horizon, The Guardian UK, 2007-2014]
attributes.background:
Anabolic Steroids are not intoxicating drugs that are used to get high, rather steroids are for athletes and those who take part in sports, they are simply performance enhancement drugs that help 

By legalising steroids the fitness community will benefit in many obvious ways.
